## 문제1.

::: {.callout-note title="$2^3 \\times 2^4 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^7$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제2.

::: {.callout-note title="$5^6 \\div 5^2 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $5^4$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제3.

::: {.callout-note title="$(3^2)^3 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $3^6$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제4.

::: {.callout-note title="$2^4 \\times 2^3 \\div 2^2 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^5$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제5.

::: {.callout-note title="$7^0 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $1$
:::

## 문제6.

::: {.callout-note title="$10^{-3} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $\frac{1}{10^3}$
:::

## 문제7.

::: {.callout-note title="$2 \\times 3^2 \\times 2^3 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^4 \times 3^2 = 16 \times 9 = 144$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제8.

::: {.callout-note title="$(4^2 \\div 4)^3 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $4^3 = 64$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제9.

::: {.callout-note title="$(2^3)^2 \\times 2^{-4} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{6 - 4} = 2^2 = 4$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제10.

::: {.callout-note title="$6^2 \\div 6^{-3} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $6^{2 + 3} = 6^5$
:::

## 문제11.

::: {.callout-note title="$(2^3 \\times 3^2)^2 \\div 2^4 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{6 - 4} \times 3^4 = 2^2 \times 81 = 4 \times 81 = 324$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제12.

::: {.callout-note title="$(5^2)^3 \\div 5^4 \\cdot 5^{-1} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $5^{6 - 4 - 1} = 5^1 = 5$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제13.

::: {.callout-note title="$\\frac{3^{-2}}{3^3 \\times 3^{-1}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $3^{-2 - 3 + 1} = 3^{-4} = \frac{1}{81}$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제14.

::: {.callout-note title="$(4^3 \\times 2^2)^2 \\div (2^3 \\times 4)^3 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{12 + 4 - 9 - 6} = 2^1 = 2$
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 문제15.

::: {.callout-note title="$(10^{-2} \\cdot 5^3)^2 \\div (2 \\cdot 5)^3 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $10^{-4} \times 5^6 \div 2^3 \times 5^3 = \frac{5^9}{2^3 \times 10^4} = \frac{5^9}{2^3 \times 2^4 \times 5^4} = \frac{5^5}{2^7}$
:::
